transArray.content: The location is good, near the southern end of Qianmen Street. The design of the hotel is relatively trendy and lively. There is a lazy mobile phone holder at the bedside. Some of the young ladies at the front desk are very enthusiastic, and some are soso. I didn't eat breakfast at the hotel. I didn't eat much breakfast, and there was Lawson next to me. It is not far from Zhushikou Subway Station, and it takes just over an hour to get to Daxing Airport from the hotel.
